system.description:
You have been inducted into the deeper magical mysteries of your order, gaining the following benefits:

  • You may add your witch and cleric levels together for the purpose of what spells you can prepare, but only for spells that are on both the cleric and witch spell lists. These spells count against your normal number of prepared spells and the total number of higher level spells each class may prepare is equal to your proficiency bonus.
  • You may add half your cleric levels to your witch level for the purpose of the ritual mastery ability.
  • You may add half your witch level to your cleric level for the purpose of your empowered turning ability and your uses of Channel Divinity.  In addition, you may spend a spell slot of 3rd level or higher in order to Channel Divinity without expending a use of that ability.
